alert.note: Alert for Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:00PM EDT until July 28 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tucker County in northeastern West Virginia... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Philippi, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Parsons, Davis, Thomas, Hendricks, Hambleton, Benbush, Elk, Lead Mine, Pifer Moutain, Canaan Valley State Park, Pheasant Run, Blackwater Falls, Davisville, Cortland, Saint George, Red Creek, Laneville, and Canaan Hgts. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
